傿字的基本解释

傿
yān
古书上说的神仙名。
古同“鄢”（ａ．古地名；ｂ．姓）。

傿
yàn
抬价。

傿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》於建切，去願，影。］
豫价，抬高价格。
[②]［yān］
［《集韻》於虔切，平，羣。］
(1)古姓氏。
(2)古县名。在今河南柘城县北。
(3)神仙名。

傿字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傿； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页115第11
【唐韻】【集韻】?於建切，音匽。【玉篇】引爲價也。　又【集韻】隱幰切。與鄢同。縣名。【前漢·地理志】傿屬?留郡。【註】同鄢。　又【國名記】傿，䢵姓。今襄之宜城，楚之鄢都。一曰郢。　又【集韻】於虔切，音焉。神仙名。【揚子·太玄賦】納傿祿於江淮兮。【註】二神仙名。

傿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
傿字的起名意思

暂无。

傿
Basic explanation of words
傿
yān
The name of the fairy in ancient books.
The ancient same "Yan" (a. ancient place name; b. surname).
傿
yàn
Bid up.
傿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guang Yun" Yu Jianqie, Qu Yuan, Ying. ]
Inferred price, raise the price.
[②]［yān］
["Ji Yun" Yu Qianqie, Ping , Qun. ]
(1) Ancient surname.
(2) The name of the ancient county. In today's north of Zhecheng County, Henan.
(3) The name of the fairy.
傿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傿; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 115-11
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Jianqie, the sound is 匽. [Jade articles] cited as price.　[Jiyun] Hidden and cut. Same as Yan. County name. [Pre-Han Geography] Nationality belongs to? Liu County. [Note] Same as Yan.　[Country Names] Ni, surname. Today is the Yicheng of Xiang and the capital of Chu Yan. One said Ying.　 [Ji Yun] Yu Qianqie, Yin Yan. Fairy name. 【Yangtze·Tai Xuan Fu】accept the ancestors in Jianghuai. [Note] The name of the two gods.
傿
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan

Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
傿
Name meaning
Nothing.
yàn, yān, yìn
